nodes.text: A T-series tactical droid was a droid created to serve the Navy of the Confederacy of Independent Systems. It was destroyed during the Battle of Umbara.

During the Clone Wars around 21 BBY, this T-series tactical droid commanded a Separatist supply ship during the Battle of Umbara. The ship was supplying the Umbarans, creating hardships for the Republic. The tactical droid was destroyed along with the supply ship when Umbaran starfighters commandeered by clone troopers flew into the ship's hangar, and blew up the main reactor.
